summary: When a college piano prodigy tries to check his mother into rehab, he is taken hostage by her drug dealer and swept along on a wild adventure.
cast: Jesse Eisenberg|Melissa Leo|Tracy Morgan|Emma Rayne Lyle|Sarah Ramos|Isiah Whitlock Jr.|Stephanie March|Paul Calderon|Neal Huff|Jayce Bartok|Harper Dill|Tanya Wright|Marilyn Berry|Luna Catarevas|Susan Barnes|Kai Chapman|Stephen Payne|Nicole Quinn|Ryan McCarthy|Jay Israelson|Sebastian Blanck|Hannah Cohen|Dean F. Barnes|Joseph Basile|Kevin Cannon|Bill Chemerka|Scott Danni|Chester Davis|Sean Dermond|Richard Hutchings|Travis Misarti|Cameron Scott Nadler|Duncan B. Putney|Wayne Pyle|Helen Rogers|Nicole Signore|Bettina Skye|Logan Strand|Ben Stumpf
title: Why Stop Now?
